sentences.en: The mosque of umar,located next to the church of the holy sepulcher,features a syrian-type minaret.
sentences.cn: 位于圣墓教堂附近的欧麦尔清真寺，有一个叙利亚式尖塔。
他们还朝一个尖塔开了炮。

sentences.en: Wen is the minaret of the ancient town of Chaoyang mark.
sentences.cn: 文光塔是古邑潮阳的标志.

trans.tran_cn: （清真寺旁由报告祈祷时刻的人使用的）光塔
trans.tran_en: a tall thin tower on a  mosque  , from which Muslims are called to prayer
